post_title: Some tough ones for sale- Browne, Burch, Reulbach. Reduced!
post_content:
Offering the following.  All are tough for one reason or another. Prices are net to me, and include shipping in the USA (AK & HI extra). Browne & Burch are shown using their SGC database scans.  Reulbach cell photo is weak and is much brighter than shown.

Browne Washington SC350, SGC 3, $240
Burch batting, Pied 150, SGC 3, $150
Reulbach, glove shows, SC150, SGC 2  $115

Take all three for $475 shipped
